subject: Politics
title: What Is Democracy
description: A short lesson to help you apply What Is Democracy.

hook.text: Democracy means 'rule by the people.' In practice, people pick leaders who make decisions for them.

buildup.text: Athens invented democracy 2,500 years ago. Citizens voted directly on laws in open assemblies.

discovery.text: Modern democracy is mostly representative. Citizens elect leaders who then govern on their behalf.

twist.text: Most democracies are imperfect. Money, media, and power still skew whose voices get heard.

climax.text: Democracy isn't just elections. It needs free press, rule of law, and protection for minorities.

punchline.text: Democracy isn't perfect. It's just better than everything else.
